EmailTemplate.name: Server Space NO USAR
EmailTemplate.subject: TEST NO USAR
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Hope you are well.
It has been some time since we last spoke but I just wanted to firstly wish you a Happy New Year and secondly inform you of some exciting news;
ServerSpace was recently voted 10th place in the Deloitte Fast - 50 Fastest Growing Technology Companies 2012.
You were very keen on using some of our services a few years ago and I wondered if it would be possible to reconnect with you and find out how things are going with your current IT infrastructure.
I have attached a case study and company brochure for your perusal.
Any feedback, questions, quote requests are most welcome.
Look forward to hearing from you,
Best Regards
Sohm Kapila Sales Executive
ServerSpace 93-95 Borough High Street London, SE1 1NL T: 0207 129 7005 F: 08701 992 688 E: sohm@serverspace.co.uk W:www.serverspace.co.uk L I:http://uk.linkedin.com/pub/sohm-kapila/18/676/805
